context: what color is the switches?
response: Supposively they are Cherry blues, but they fail so often in this keyboard that I'm not convinced this information is true. Had three of them, all three had their switches fail after about a month. I have three other keyboards with Cherry switches and none of them has that problem.

context: I know that light gun games do not work with HDTV's. But...becase this is connected through VGA has anyone tried to see if light gun games work?
response: Light guns don't work on HDTVs because they have too much input lag. This cable won't change that; light guns still won't work with an HDTV.

context: My son is about to be 11 and is dying for this game.  I've never bought him an M rated game.  How is the violence and language in this game?

context: I can't seem to get it to connect. Any help/suggestions/directions?
response: Connect it to both usb ports and then push the ps button in the middle. If that doesn't work then push the other two buttons. If that doesn't work then you have a faulty controller and you should send it back

context: Just getting into these games; are there levels of difficulty on this game so a newbee can learn easily???
